subject: Regarding order SSN3257
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I hope you’re doing well.
I just received the DHL tracking number for my pedal order (CE326630069DE),
and I noticed that the shipment appears to be going from Germany to the
Netherlands. Since I’m located in Budapest, I wanted to check if this
routing is normal or if there might be an issue with the delivery.

Could you please confirm that the package is on the correct route and still
expected to arrive in Hungary?

Thank you very much for your help!

Kind regards,
Botond Nyilas

conversations.body_text: Hi Botond Nyilas,    Sorry, this is the correct logistics tracking link.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326630231DE
